title: JMI Notification 2025 - Apply Offline for Guest Craft Teacher Post
description: Jamia Millia Islamia (JMI) has declared the job notification for 2025. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass, ITI, can utilize this chance and apply for the Guest Craft Teacher Jobs. Here, we included the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the JMI Notification 2025 . Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. For more details, visit the official website. If you are...
